5.eng-name: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: Malik b Huwairith reported:I came to the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) along with a companion of mine, and when we intended to return from him, he said: When there is time for prayer, announce prayer, pronounce Iqama, and the oldest amongst you should lead the prayer

chapter.eng-name: Who is more entitled to lead the prayer
